title: subway surfer whopper new year edition
description:
Subway Surfer Whopper  New Year Special Edition is an amazing endless running game for android users. Dash , dodge ,jump , swift and enjoy the applications savour to its fullest. This modded app helps you in staying at the top of the game and this is secret to beat the ones at the top .Help Jake, Tricky and Fresh get away from the grumpy inspector and his canine and be the superior.          

Official Wikipedia description of Subway Surfer 

Subway Surfers is an "endless running" mobile game. It is available on Android. Players of the game take the role of teenage hooligans who, upon being caught in the act of applying graffiti to a metro railway site, run down the tracks to escape the Inspector and his dog. As the hooligans run, they grab gold coins out of the air while simultaneously dodging collisions with railway cars and other objects. Special objects, such as the Weekly Hunt, can result an award in the game.

Key features:-

1.Grind trains with your cool crew

2.Color and vivid HD graphics

3.Hoverboard browsing

4.Lightning quick swipe acrobatics

WHAT'S NEW IN THE WHOPPER NEW YEAR EDITION:-

1.Ride in astonishing style with board improvement

2.Play along fb friends and enjoy group games 

3.Unlimited lives

4.Unlimited coins

5.Reach new scores you never thought you could
